snippet: The Moroccan woman at the center of former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi’s sex-for-hire trial accused investigators on Thursday of waging psychological warfare against her.
abstract: Karima el-Mahroug, Moroccan woman at center of former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi’s sex-for-hire trial, accuses investigators of waging psychological warfare against her and manipulating her testimony during interrogations.
lead_paragraph: The Moroccan woman at the center of former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi’s sex-for-hire trial accused investigators on Thursday of waging psychological warfare against her.

headline.seo: Italy: Woman in Berlusconi Case Issues a Denunciation
headline.main: Italy: Woman in Berlusconi Case Issues a Denunciation
headline.print_headline: Italy: Woman in Berlusconi Case Issues a Denunciation
